changeSet.comment: Change the values of Account Holder type to reflect the rephrasing of the possible values

changeSet.author: mhortis
changeSet.comment: Change comment on column type of Account Holder
changeSet.sql: COMMENT ON COLUMN "account_holder"."type" IS 'The account holder type: INDIVIDUAL, ORGANISATION, GOVERNMENT';

changeSet.comment: Introduces the table for ETS reconciliations

changeSet.comment: Introduces the table for ETS reconciliation history

changeSet.author: ltsallas
changeSet.rollback: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "account_holder_files" CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "user_files" CASCADE;

changeSet.author: pougouniasn
changeSet.sql: alter table "reconciliation" alter column "data" drop not null;
